SELECT bci.`uid`, (select bu.uname from b_user bu where bu.uid = bci.uid) as uname, (select bu.mobile from b_user bu where bu.uid = bci.uid) as mobile, (select bc.cname from b_user bu,b_committees bc where bu.uid = bci.uid and bc.cid = bu.committee_id) as committeeName, bci.`activity_id`, bci.`idcard_front_url`, bci.`idcard_back_url`, bci.`status`, bci.`team_content`, bci.`create_time`, bci.`update_time` FROM b_convener_info bci
and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = bci.`uid` and bu1.uname like concat('%',#{queryName},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = bci.`uid` and bu1.mobile like concat('%',#{queryMobile},'%'))
and bci.`status` = #{queryStatus}
ORDER BY bci.uid DESC
SELECT `uid`, `activity_id`, `idcard_front_url`, `idcard_back_url`, `status`, team_content, `create_time`, `update_time` FROM b_convener_info WHERE uid = #{uid}
